channel.title: ~~~Need help with item prices~~~
channel.description:
Hi, I am trying to change my prices on some items in my shop, but it is not that simple. I want to make the prices the amount of another item. For example, I am trying to make a Granite Maul cost 50 Tokkuls (Item ID 6529). How can I configure this?
Summary: How can I make the price of one item the amount of another item? (Gmaul = 50 Tokkuls)
Any help would be appreciated. Please reply with any knowledge you have if you have viewed this post!

item.title: ~~~Need help with item prices~~~
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

i mean how?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 07, 2008, 08:01:45 AM[/size][hr]when i open up the price thing…it just says a number…and thats for coins

Read full topic

item.title: ~~~Need help with item prices~~~
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

Make the tokkul price the value of coins/value of tokkul or something.

Read full topic
